thread.title: Disney, Apple advance helps lift US stocks
thread.title_full: Disney, Apple advance helps lift US stocks

title: Disney, Apple advance helps lift US stocks
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Aug 17, 2015, 21:23 BST - UK Markets closed Disney, Apple advance helps lift US stocks AFP – 6 minutes ago View Photo 

Gains by Disney, Apple (NasdaqGS: AAPL - news ) and some other large equities helped lift US stocks into positive territory Monday ahead of earnings from Wal-Mart Stores and Federal Reserve meeting minutes. 
At the closing bell, the Dow Jones Industrial Average was at 17,545.75, up 68.35 points (0.39 percent). 
The broad-based S&P 500 rose 10.96 (0.52 percent) to 2,102.50, while the tech-rich Nasdaq Composite Index jumped 43.46 (0.86 percent) to 5,091.70 
Disney rose 1.8 percent following a weekend presentation on plans to add to theme parks attractions from the wildly popular "Star Wars" movie franchise. 
Dow members Apple and McDonald's rose 1.0 percent and 1.4 percent, respectively. 
Highlights this week include Wal-Mart earnings Tuesday and Wednesday's release of Fed minutes, which could shed light on the US central bank's timing for an interest rate increase, expected later this year.
